working_experience.title: Programmer/Developer
working_experience.description: Junior Developer on the web software tool Kronis

working_experience.title: IT Manager/Developer
working_experience.description: IT Manager responsible for the administration of M360 platform apps and PowerPlatform Developer

education.institution: Zespół Szkół Urszulańskich w Rybniku (Ursulines School Complex in Rybnik)

education.level: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science/Informatics Engineering

education.institution: Blekinge Tekniska Högskola (Blekinge Institute of Technology)

projects.title: Amazon web scraping and predictor training
projects.description: A script was designed to collect comments from various Amazon products. Translations were embedded for comments in different languages, followed by a model training phase that predicted the star rating from comment text.

projects.title: Dataset regularization and ML model comparison
projects.description: An incomplete dataset containing economic information and bankruptcy labels was cleaned and pre-processed before training several models to find the most suitable classification algorithm.

projects.title: Image processing and classification
projects.description: This project involved processing and vectorizing an image dataset of dogs and cats. The goal was to classify them using image features and machine learning techniques.

projects.title: Dataset analysis and model training
projects.description: A dataset was selected and analyzed to study the relationship between attributes and class labels. A variety of machine learning models were trained and evaluated.

projects.title: Cell conquest/tower defense game
projects.description: A real-time multiplayer game developed in Java where players compete by expanding their territory and attacking others using programmed cells. Networking and event handling were central to gameplay.

projects.title: Madrid bus lines web
projects.description: A web project using the EMT API of Madrid to visualize public transport lines. Implemented using vanilla PHP and JS with a MySQL database. Admin tools and user login included.

projects.title: Art sales website
projects.description: A sales site built from scratch with pagination, filters, mock purchases, admin features, and login functionality. Built with PHP, JS, and MySQL using XAMPP.

projects.title: Translation of Qt examples from C++ to Python
projects.description: A personal project to learn PySide by translating Qt C++ examples to Python. It helped understand GUI layout design, signals/slots, and SVG rendering.

projects.title: Project Caelus
projects.description: A CanSat Navarra project involving a soda can-sized satellite with sensors and a parachute. Worked on 3D design, Arduino integration, and mechanical components.

projects.title: Collaboration grant/Thesis
projects.description: Started as a collaboration grant and evolved into a thesis with a reactive sand-based interface for image generation. The system uses a Kinect camera, switch-based communication, and AI models to interpret sand deformation and generate matching images.

projects.title: Back-end/front-end development + Kronis APIs
projects.description: Work for the Kronis web app including API creation, Django backend, frontend refactors, and migration to React. Tasks included database modeling, route creation, and UI improvements.

projects.title: RoboArm
projects.description: A robotic arm connected to an Arduino and synced with a PC-based simulation to lift and move cubes. Involved mechanical and software integration, from design to electronics.

projects.title: Numismatics project
projects.description: 3D printing project aimed at preserving numismatic items with replicable, scalable tools and designs. Developed a desktop app for viewing and processing 3D models using CadQuery and VTK.

projects.title: Mountain Shelters Website
projects.description: Collaborative .NET + React web project to map and manage information about mountain shelters. Used EF, SQLite, dynamic filters, and mapping features.

projects.title: Personal Website
projects.description: Create a website to showcase the resume and projects in an accessible format.

projects.title: Further Studies: AI Master
projects.description: Pursue an AI Master’s degree offered by UPNA for the 2025-2026 academic year to deepen knowledge of machine learning, AI systems, and ethical application.

additional_info: This document is a condensed collection of various projects that showcase knowledge, experience, and future development ideas.
